name: Quadrate Instant Hot Reusable Pack
descr:
Chiroform Quadrate Instant Hot Reusable Pack.

Specifications:
7.6"x11"(19.2cm x 28.8cm)

To use simply flex the inside metal plate, the pack will immediately reach a temperature of 54 celsius degrees.
When the pack has cooled, submerge the pack in hot water to return it to its liquid form.
When all the crystals are gone, the pack can be used again or stored to provide instant heat whenever needed time and time again.
Made of PVC, this hot pack is portable, reusable and ideal for backside, shoulder, stomach, thigh, calf and arm treatment.

12pcs/carton.
